snippet: Officials have given the go-ahead for an ambitious attempt to set upright the Costa Concordia, the cruise liner that went aground last year, killing 32 people.
abstract: Italian officials give go-ahead for ambitious attempt to set upright the Costa Concordia, cruise liner that went aground near an Italian island in 2012, killing 32 people.
lead_paragraph: Officials have given the go-ahead for an ambitious attempt to set upright the Costa Concordia, the cruise liner that went aground last year, killing 32 people.

headline.main: Italy: Permission Granted to Try to Right Damaged Cruise Ship
headline.print_headline: Italy: Permission Granted to Try To Right Damaged Cruise Ship
